pkgmetadata.longdescription: Uncertainties of Climate Projections using Smoothing Splines // These functions use smoothing-splines, data augmentation and Bayesian techniques for the assessment of single-member and incomplete ensembles of climate projections. - Cheng, C.-I. and P. L. Speckman (2012) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2012.05.020. - Evin, G., B. Hingray, J. Blanchet, N. Eckert, S. Morin, and D. Verfaillie. (2019) doi:10.1175/JCLI-D-18-0606.1.
